title: Give and Receive: Book 3
description: What is satisfaction...if the hunger remains?No more games to be played. The time had come to step up.I’m going to take the forbidden fruit being offered. From both men.Dance with the devil…Learn to fly.But sometimes, when you fly too close to the sun….You get burned.I say what’s a little pain of heat…without the reward of pleasure.I'll take the offering. I want them both.And I intend to have them.Don't worry...I wear my scars well.***Give and Receive is an erotic romance serial released every 4 to 6 weeks, at approximately 10000 to 14000 words each. Due to graphic sexual content and language, we recommend this to mature audiences, ages 18 and over, who are comfortable with this subject matter.***
author: Alisa Anderson
